page.topic: Advanced Record List - List Box Control Syntax
page.syntax: [%KL= Table,{ Keylist_Expression } [ { Filter_Expression } ] % [. Width [, Height ]] Variable_Name [ ! rl_* ][ ? Enabled ] ]

argument.name: Table
argument.description: Character. The name of the table supplying the data to be displayed.

argument.name: Keylist_Expression
argument.description: Character. Defines the order of the data in the record list and the columns in the record list. Uses a special function called KEYLIST_BUILD().

argument.name: Filter_Expression
argument.description: Character. Optional. Default = all records. Filters the data that is shown in the Keylist_Expression.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Numeric. The width of the control.

argument.name: Height
argument.description: Numeric. The height of the control.

argument.name: Variable_Name
argument.description: Character. The name of a character variable to receive the user selection, or a numeric variable to receive the index value of the selected radio button. The index of the top-most button is 1.

page.description: The Record List - List Box Control provides a dynamic view of selected records and fields from a table or set.

section.note: You must not have any space characters in the finished command.
